price: 26. Kuwa gaaloobay waxay yiraahdeen: Ha dhegaysannina Qur’aankan oo ku fura buuq waa intaasoo aad adkaataane10.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: 10. Waxay arrintan uga dan lahaayeen inay dadka ka celiyaan dhageysiga ama fahmidda Qur’aanka

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
